title: Kemu
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Raw, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian, Bakery, British, Catering, English, European, Taiwanese
description: A cozy vegetarian place with mostly groovy Buddha beats focused on a vegan lifestyle. Coffee is prepared by experienced baristas. Hot chocolate is made from real Belgian chocolate, not powders. No deep frying with most foods baked, roasted or raw. Superfoods such as South American berries and grains featured, especially in the raw breakfast options such as gluten free bircher bowls, vegan smoothies and others. Taiwanese style food and drink menu with regular menu items and regular additions based on customer feedback. Has gluten free options. Free Wi-Fi.  Limited indoor seating with additional outdoor seats.
